## encodeUrlParameters() function

Extract URL safe values from the current exposition state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function encodeUrlParameters<T extends Exposition$1<any>>(exposition: T): ExpositionUrlData;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  exposition | T | values that should be used for the UrlData |

<b>Returns:</b>

ExpositionUrlData


## Example

const exposition = createExposition(<!-- -->{ auth: { options: \['valid ✅', 'deny ❌'\] } } as const)

encodeUrlParameters(exposition)
